Title: Mitsubishi Electric’s Railcar Motor System Wins R&D 100 Award
Summary: TOKYO, October 3, 2025 - Mitsubishi Electric Corporation (TOKYO: 6503) announced today that its energy- and resource-saving synchronous reluctance motor and inverter traction system (SynTRACS) for railcars has received a 2025 R&D 100 Award from the U.S. publication R&D World. This marks the 28th R&D 100 Award that Mitsubishi Electric has won to date.

Title: Danfoss reinforces commitment to cybersecurity with ISO 27001 certification
Summary: With the increasing sophistication of cyber threats, protecting sensitive information has become more critical than ever. As a global leader in solutions that increase machine productivity, reduce emissions, lower energy consumption, and enable electrification, Danfoss is committed to building a secure foundation for the future, enabling us to continue to deliver innovative and sustainable solutions while maintaining the highest levels of security.

Title: HPT: 15th IEA Heat Pump Conference 2026
Summary: From 26 to 29 May 2026, Vienna will open its doors for the 15th IEA Heat Pump Conference – the leading scientific conference and meeting place for academia, industry, market, policy makers and investors interested in the field of heat pumping technologies. Under the motto ‘Decarbonisation through Innovation’, experts from all over the world will meet to present and discuss the latest advances and developments.The AIT Austrian Institute of Technology began researching and developing high-temperature heat pumps around ten years ago and established itself as a top research partner in Europe. The conference is organized by the Technology Collaboration Programme on Heat Pumping Technologies (HPT TCP) by IEA. As a member of the HPT TCP’s International Organising Committee (IOC), we are delighted to be hosting the conference in Europe in 2026. The conference takes place every three years – in the USA, Europe and Asia respectively – and serves as a lively forum for the exchange of information on research, applications, market, policy and standards in the field of heat pump technology.

Title: Arkema’s product carbon footprint calculation methodology certified by TÜV Rheinland
Summary: Arkema is proud to announce that its product carbon footprint (PCF) calculation methodology has been validated and certified by TÜV Rheinland according to the ISO 14067:2018 standard.

Over the past two years, Danfoss and Palladio have evaluated technological synergies, particularly in high-lift heat pumps. Integrating Palladio's screw compressors with Danfoss' existing technologies promises competitive and advanced high-temperature solutions, the company says.

Title: Dunham-Bush Showcases Athena ACM-AE Oil-free Chiller at MARVEX 2025
Summary: At the MARVEX 2025 in Malaysia, Dunham-Bush showcased its Athena ACM-AE series oil-free air-cooled magnetic bearing chiller. The unit features oil-free magnetic bearing compressor technology, an eco-friendly HFO refrigerant, and variable speed EC condenser fans, delivering high energy efficiency and superior IPLV performance. It offers optional integrated free-cooling and adiabatic cooling capabilities and is AHRI certified. The Athena ACM-AE series stood out at the show as a high-performance, eco-conscious solution, designed specifically for demanding cooling applications—particularly mission-critical data centers and large-scale commercial facilities.

Title: Mitsubishi Electric: supermarkets
Summary: In today’s food retail landscape, several types of supermarkets cater to different consumer needs. Traditional supermarkets are medium-sized stores located in urban or residential areas, offering a full range of food and everyday products. Hypermarkets are large-scale outlets, often found in suburban areas, that also sell non-food items such as electronics, clothing, and household goods. Organic or specialized supermarkets focus on natural, local, or diet-specific products, ideal for those seeking more conscious nutrition. Convenience stores provide quick shopping solutions thanks to their central locations and extended hours.
